Text:
Classification: Documentary
Genre: Family | Lifestyle
Status: New Series
Network: BBC THREE ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Wednesdays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: January 09, 2013

Growing Up Poor is a documentary series which is filmed over the course of a complete summer following different groups of people all attempting to survive on under £10 per day.


(http://www.tvrage.com/shows/id-33967)
